hadith.chapterTitle: Merit of Suhur (Predawn meal in Ramadan) and the Excellence of Delaying having it till before Dawn
hadith.body:
'Amr bin Al-'As (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "The difference between our observance of Saum (fasting) and that of the people of the Scriptures is Suhur (predawn meal in Ramadan)."

[Muslim].

hadith.chapterTitle: - باب فضل السحور وتأخيره ما لم يخشَ طلوع الفجر‏:
hadith.body: - وعن عمرو بن العاص رضي الله عنه أن رسول الله قال‏:‏ ‏"‏فصل ما بين صيامنا وصيام أهل الكتاب أكلة السحر‏.‏ ‏(‏‏(‏رواه مسلم‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
